      • WorldModel

        public WorldModel(com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Array<java.lang.String> targetJsons,
                  java.util.Map<java.lang.String,com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2> targetCoords)
        Constructs a WorldModel from a list of targets and their positions on the displayed map.
        Parameters:
        targetJsons - Array of target json filenames
        targetCoords - Map of target_name->coords for exactly the targets described by the jsons

    • Method Detail

      • getGameState

        public WorldModel.GAMESTATE getGameState()
        Returns the current state of this world. State can be: WIN, LOSE, ONGOING
        Returns:
        the world's current state

      • getWorldCoordinates

        public com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 getWorldCoordinates(java.lang.String targetName,
                                                         java.lang.String fact)
        Returns the world coordinates for a given target fact.
        Parameters:
        targetName - The string name of the selected target
        fact - The specific fact belonging to `targetName`
        Returns:
        Vector world coordinates of the target fact's origin

      • addTarget

        public void addTarget(java.lang.String t)
        Adds target to model. New target world coords are 0,0, but does not change existing coordinates.
        Parameters:
        t - name of json file containing target data

      • addTarget

        public void addTarget(java.lang.String t,
                      com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 coords)
        Adds target to model.
        Parameters:
        t - name of json file containing target data
        coords - world coordinates of target

      • interact

        public java.lang.String interact(java.lang.String targetname,
                                 java.lang.String fact)
        General function that handles clicking on a node. Hacks or scans node if appropriate and returns an empty string. If node has already been scanned, returns node contents.
        Parameters:
        targetname - target to interact with
        fact - particular node id of target to interact with
        Returns:
        empty string if hacking or scanning, else fact contents

      • hack

        public WorldModel.GAMESTATE hack(java.lang.String targetname,
                                 java.lang.String fact)

        Parameters:
        targetname - target to hack
        fact - particular node id of target to hack
        Returns:

      • scan

        public java.lang.String scan(java.lang.String targetname,
                             java.lang.String fact)
        Scan function, decreases player AP and logs and returns scan results May throw runtime exceptions if provided invalid inputs
        Parameters:
        targetname - target to scan
        fact - particular node id of target to scan
        Returns:
        contents of scanned node, NOT CURRENT GAMESTATE

        Parameters:

        fact - fact to expose
